title: Lumbar Puncture Simulation-Based Practical Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Blended education combining smartphone-based video learning and simulation practice, applying a mobile-first approach in limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the five core steps of the lumbar puncture procedure with 80% accuracy.
Learners can apply aseptic techniques with over 70% accuracy on standardized patient models.
Learners can achieve at least 75% performance in nine or more of the twelve LumPAT assessment items.
Learners can demonstrate a 30% or greater improvement in self-confidence in pre-post self-assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
